subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: “She was a happy little kid,” Rika Moore, a youth coach at Vail, said of Shiffrin, “but she was unbelievably focused on making perfect turns, one after another.”
snippet: “She was a happy little kid,” Rika Moore, a youth coach at Vail, said of Shiffrin, “but she was unbelievably focused on making perfect turns, one after another.”
